name: You are NOT helping (prototype)
description:
"You are NOT helping" is a short strategy RPG battle mockup where your ally character aptly named Sidekick basically does nothing except follow you and get in the way of the boss's attack. It was supposed to be harder but we didn't have time to program better AI.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Move cursor

Z  - Confirm

X - Back

Enter - Restart Game

CREDITS

Programming, GUI assets and character portraits done by me

Character sprites and animations done by seudofix     https://seudofix.itch.io/

Background track done by Keelan Cooper https://prinxess.bandcamp.com/

Sound effects taken from zapslat and a unity asset store pack
